tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SecurityEquipmentInventory ( 
 equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 equipment_name STRING, 
 equipment_type STRING, 
 location STRING, 
 quantity INT, 
 last_updated TIMESTAMP 
 );

CREATE TABLE security_cameras (
    camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    resolution VARCHAR(20),
    price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  resolution VARCHAR(20),
  price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  battery_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE alarms (
  alarm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  sound_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Cameras (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    resolution VARCHAR(10),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Alarms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    zone VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    item_id INT,
    item_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);
